The economy’s resilience is clearest in the job market. Nothing suggests the economy is
even close to losing jobs. The evidence shows sturdy hiring, plentiful job openings, and low
layoffs by historical standards. Sturdy consumer spending also displays the economy’s
health. Households are not spending with abandon, and their spending patterns have been
shifting, but they are doing their part to keep the economy moving ahead. Healthy stock
